sentences.en: Dan burned to know what the reason could be.
sentences.cn: 丹急于想知道原因。

sentences.en: For some inexplicable reason she was attracted to Patrick.
sentences.cn: 因为某些无法解释的原因，她被帕特里克所吸引。

sentences.en: for some reason he likes you.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他喜欢你。

sentences.en: he indulged Andrew beyond all reason.
sentences.cn: 他毫无道理地纵容安德鲁。

sentences.en: He tried again to get her to see reason.
sentences.cn: 他再次试图让她明白自己错了。

sentences.en: He usually moseys into town for no special reason.
sentences.cn: 他常无所事事地溜达到城里。

sentences.en: His reason had been permanently affected by what he had witnessed.
sentences.cn: 他所目睹的那一幕永久性地影响了他的神智。

sentences.en: I really don't see any reason for changing it.
sentences.cn: 我真的不明白为什么要改变它。

sentences.en: I reasoned that changing my diet would lower my cholesterol level.
sentences.cn: 我推断改变我的饮食会降低我的胆固醇水平。

sentences.en: I will take any job that comes along, within reason.
sentences.cn: 我会接受任何给我的工作，只要是正当的。

sentences.en: it stands to reason that if you can eradicate the fear the nervousness will subside.
sentences.cn: 如果你根除恐惧心理，紧张感会随之减轻，这是显而易见的事情。

sentences.en: No reason was given for the banning of the magazine.
sentences.cn: 杂志被无端取缔了。

sentences.en: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.cn: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.en: Smith isn't his real name, that stands to reason.
sentences.cn: 很显然，史密斯不是他的真名。

sentences.en: That was the very reason why he felt a certain bitterness.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么他感到有些痛苦。

sentences.en: the ability to reason
sentences.cn: 判断能力

sentences.en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
sentences.cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

sentences.en: the child is usually too emotionally overwrought to listen to reason.
sentences.cn: 这孩子通常太受感情左右，而不顾理智。

sentences.en: The company's top executives had refused to listen to reason.
sentences.cn: 公司的高层管理人员拒绝理智行事。

sentences.en: the human power of reason
sentences.cn: 人类的理性

sentences.en: The person may become dizzy for no apparent reason.
sentences.cn: 这类人可能会莫名其妙地感到头晕。

sentences.en: The reason for my visit had obviously slipped his mind.
sentences.cn: 他显然已经忘掉了我的来意。

sentences.en: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.cn: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

sentences.en: To an extent, that is the reason for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，那就是召开这次会议的原因。

words.tran_cn: 合理的，公道的；通情达理的
详尽论述的；理由充分的；合乎逻辑的
不合理的；不理智的，无理性的；无推理能力的

phrases.tran_cn: 合情理；是当然的，自不待言
无缘无故；无端；没有理由的
不知什么原因，不知何故
合乎情理地：具有良好情理或证明的；合情合理地
服从理智；听取意见，接受道理

phrases.phrase: theirs (或 ours) not to reason why

phrases.tran_cn: 正当地：有充足理由地；正当地
合理地：在良好的情理和现实范围之内地

trans.tran_en: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

trans.tran_cn: 推论， 推理； 劝说
trans.tran_en: to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

trans.tran_cn: 论证，推断，分析；与…评理，劝说
trans.tran_en: to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts
